p: Various serological and molecular assays have been developed and used for laboratory diagnosis ( 152). Competitive ELISA, VNT, and conventional/real-time RT-PCR assays have been apricated for BTV surveillances in mainland China and Korea ( 137– 139, 141, 143– 145). The agar gel immunodiffusion (AGID) test for detection of antibodies to BTV also had been used ( 131). However, cross-reactions between IBAV and BTV may result in false-positive to BTV-AGID ( 153). There is no available information for applicable BTV vaccines in East Asia.
